message.body: Ahhh, got my battery finally
Oh, android, how I've missed you...
lol
what are you doing Thursday night?
I forget
Umm
Oh, meeting at my house about communities. Its dans thing and I could give a fuck at this point
I might try for Thursday night instead, idk
I might try getting together with Michael tomorrow, since the other nights are more conflicty
fair warning, there might be people at my house thursday
How late? And did you want to be there for it? Because we could always go hang out somewhere until they leave. Assuming that they leave.
I'd kinda like to be here to some extent
but that could change
hard to say at this point, and yes we could go somewhere, but where?
why not have Michael meet us at the Italian festival/bar afterwards
because he'll be in Blue Bell most likely
like 10 mins from my apt
ah, yeah
besides, he doesn't seem as open to driving all over the place as we are, haha
you do what you gotta do
Just trying to figure out my options.
enh, fuck it
I was the driving force behind getting together this past weekend. He can initiate the next time.
it sounds like you were already making plans
but I could have just been assuming that
sometimes I wonder...
Not with him. I just have a general idea of his, your, and my schedules, and I was trying to figure out how they might best overlap
MY schedule...haha
=P
hmm
do you think we intentionally try to make each other jealous?
I wasn't
I kind of recognized that it could be interpreted that way
For me, it was more about trying to efficiently fit in time with both of you
I could easily see you trying to make me jealous though... ;)
Not because you want me to have feelings for you, though, necessarily.
I don't think we do consciously
but subconsciously, maybe
I was talking to Val last night and we discussed the whole claire at josh's party thing
and the whole putting my arm around you at efis party
she was like, "yeah but you do that to people all the time so I don't think anything of it"
Did anything of note happen at Josh's party on your or my part?
Or were just discussing the event in general?
If anything, I think I'd be bringing up other guys more to reinforce the distance/nonexclusivity. =/
well, whatever happened that instigated the text you sent me (and val)
ah man, maybe I shouldnt have thrown her under he bus
whattt
what text I sent her?
the one about you and Claire?
or your interest in Claire
yeah I guess
it doesn't matter
interesting
Not to this, no
my point is, I didn't realize I was doing anything
I wasn't jealous
I was entertained that you told me that your interest in her was waning and then you had your arm around her
That's it
Now I'll know better
XD
it's all relative
you didn't seem to mind me taking to Isa
yeah, I probably put too much weight on physical content
contact*
jesus christ, that girl is gorgeous
Since I'm like incredibly protective of it
She's not my type
I mean, she's pretty enough, but I wouldn't call her gorgeous
did you get a look at her eyes?
yeah
I mean it's not like Im interested or anything
though rich seemed hellbent on setting us up
lol
which I find entertaining
he was telling her what a great guy I am
That's a terrible tactic
yeah, I know
he was ok though, didn't overdue it
over do?
damn you
lol
I told you I don't care
It's something I notice, but it's not a big deal
I don't care either
I know you're intelligent and well-spoken
not in this context, but I like to not make mistakes
in general
right
Josh seemed pretty interested in Isa, and then he fucked that all up
Apparently Josh considers me off limits.
Which is fine. Just kind of entertaining.
yeah, that hadn't really occurred to me until the one night in philly
with the ridiculously drunk girl
but that was mainly because I had no intention of picking up women at the bar with you
clearly your fault
haha
It's a good strategy though
I can see it working for us
I almost asked these two girls at the bar to join us last wed
but I thought that might confuse claire a bit
lol
I had a legit reason to, seeing as we had worked together before
she was hot too
lol
I recall
do you?
You told me about her last week
oh, ok
Remember trying to figure out if you were talking about 3 or 4 women?
ohhh right
Must have been one of the nights I got enough sleep >.>
yeah
haha, so krisin told me that dan and amy had a talk
after I talked to her
and somehow he thinks he still has a shot with her
She might not have been that clear
which is infinitely confusing to me
Women tend to be exceptionally vague and hinty about that sort of thing
To try mitigating feelings and whatnot
since she made it quite clear that she's not interested
ah, okay
but that was to me, so
she seemed adamant about him not finding out about her and joe
but that was more about his feelings
tell him about Joe
or tell her to tell Dan about Joe
Dan will get over it
haha
I can't do that
Dragging it on, giving him hope is stupid
I can suggest it, but thats all
People need to grow the hell up
he's on a whole different level
he can't talk to women. that's his problem
so he likes to play it safe
and amy is safe
essentially because she's more insecure than he is
how is it that people make it to their 30's with these problems?
the fuck if I know
Seems like they'd get tired of it before then
O.o
what
I know
I mean, I went 4, essentially, while being in relationships
So it's not impossible
I was like, "that's...impossible"
It's not entirely
But you keep saying he has all these women problems
no wonder he's a wreck
XD
haha
I said, "4 days"
she replies, "HOW DO YOU LIVE!"
Yeah
Granted, it's been about 4-5 days now, and I'm going crazy haha
hmm, if you remove the quotes from that it's an entirely different context
lol
Assuming I get back at a decent time tonight, that's probably on my agenda. >.>
Hunt of the keys took precedence last night
sleep took precedence last night for me
haha
apparently Lee went out and get trashed last night
kept bugging her
thought he wasn't drinking any more
O.o
seems he was suppose to get an award from the air force, but didn't show up for the ceremony because he was still drunk
and she's madly in love with him
sort of
Yeah, she was texting me today. I told her I would already be gone.
All the patience I have for massive baggage was used up in my last three relationships
I can't decide which clothing approach to take for this date
I would say go with clothes
lol
oh
I'm afraid to inquire further.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hitachi_Magic_Wand
ah
yeah, it's good times
I mean, I don't really use it on myself, though I have
Like years at this point
It only frustrated me more when I was dating the Catholic
Yeah.
Reminding me what I had in my hand but couldn't otherwise have. =|
Sometimes "better than nothing" just isn't.
gotcha
I also decided I didn't like the style
And since it wasn't really doing much for me anyway, didn't bother replacing it
I think of it more as an enhancement
yeah
it's something different, adds a little spice
Yeah, I'm not sure if I want to delve into that stuff with you, no offense.
or ready to or whatever
That takes a lot of comfort and trust, and
I'm not sure I want to cultivate that
yeah, it's not something I usually introduce right from the get-go
just an option
I appreciate you bringing it up now, really
And not in the middle of things
as apposed to me....right
sorry if the IM was really odd
I didn't mean it to be
was a little
sorry
apologize one more time...
I'm sorry =P
thanks
how's marvin?
Martin, lol
And the date was....interesting.
whatever
Kind of the same way some people find train wrecks interesting
I think you're using the word incorrectly
More like I'm too tired to think of the right word
well, at least he showed up
An hour late
he never did apologize for that either
eh
that's one way to own it
Yeah
Would have been nice to at least get a cursory apology though
perhaps he never adjusted for daylight savings time. Im pretty sure they don't have it in germany
There were so many issues with the date
Going to give it one more shot
See if there's anything worth pursuing, but I'm pretty sure not
He seems like a cool person to know
Just not date
assuming he asks you out again
Pretty sure he will
If he doesn't, not my problem.
oh?
pretty sure of yourself there
Yes, well, you weren't in on the conversations
So excuse me for having a slightly better grasp of the situation =P
He seemed to find me odd
And unlike pretty much any other female he'd met
If nothing else, I think he's interesting in seeing me be odd again
man, I love this album
The classical-ish one
I think you said it put you to sleep
Speaking of.
I'll talk to you tomorrow.
oh, ok
did you figure out what you're doing?
When do you guys usually move to the bar?
And when do you think you'll get home?
I think last time it was around 8-8:30
Lee is talking about going to philly now to see a movie
stop it -.-
what?
you figure out what youre doing?
Leaning towards trying to meet you at the bar
what bar is it again?
we've been going to dead presidents
http://www.deadpresidentspub.com/
how's the beer list?
Nm, it looks like they're friendly with Heavy Seas, I'm sure there will be something worth drinking
I had the yards saison and was happy with it last time
they don't have much on tap but they have bottles
I'm not a huge fan of saisons usually
wed is their $10 wine bottle night
I saw
is that what you normally do?
Maybe that's Claire's plan
Split a bottle of wine with you and get you drunk ;)
I'm clearly joking
Just to let you know.
hmmm
yes, no bitterness in that statement whatsoever
It may be my plan...looks like the phils are playing as well, so they have specials during the game, $2 pints of something, I believe
something shitty most likely
miller lite and yuengling
so yeah
Fridays: $3 Rail drinks from 6-close And we always start Friday Happy Hour early for all the teachers out there!
gotta love it
lol
Lee says he's got a girl for me
sorry, a woman
he corrected himself
lol
Is he bringing her to the bar tonight?
Because that would be entertaining
and if I dig her we will take broads to the film
I quote
oh, that's his plan
I think he might actually have psychological issues. =|
but I've heard this before
for sure
just ask val
lol
this place looks promising; http://www.columbusinn.com/
for?
just looks interesting. Ive never been, they have a troegs event there in july
oh nice
eh?
Like an empty habit... a ghost reflex.
you don't do that for your other friends?
To an extent. It feels different.
yeah, it's going to happen
I'm not sure I could pull that off
but I don't think I can do that
I need some sort of emotional attachment
so it's a bit of a balancing act
haha, "feels"
oops
no, no
it's perfect
I rewrote the concept like three times, haha
So there was bound to be at least one error
I mean, Im a 'never say never' kind of guy
yeah
she was going through a divorce, and so it seemed pretty obvious that it wasn't that serious
but we did go on 'dates' as appose to just socializing in a group or whatever
in that sense we were less 'friends'
right
and rarely do I develop feelings for my friends
me neither
To the dismay of most of my friends in high school, haha
oh, I mean I have
I'm broached it
but not really anymore
But generally not
I've*
damnit
I'm trying to listen to the conference call and chat haha
good plan
=P
I seem to have misplaced the tickets I received in my search for my keys =|
Pretty sure I need them
you're a mess
aww, claire left me a reference on CS
I cleaned my room!
It's not a mess!
I just don't know where I put the "important papers"
I'm sure I had a good reason for selecting this surprisingly secure location
I'm killing it over here. 5 vouches, 30 friends, 15 references...
Great, great, and awesome
I think she likes you a bit
I have no idea what to write for you
especially after what you wrote for me, haha
I tend to get overly verbose in my references
I saw haha
I have no idea what that means, haha
it's a reference to 'the big lebowski'
ahh
wasn't a fan really
the dude abides
as in the drink
Kind of funny
I used to love those things
Now they're way too sweet for me
depends on how you make them
go lighter on the kaluah, since that's where the sweetness comes from
Is it time to go to bed yet? >.>
ugh
I couldn't sleep for shit last night
my phone starts ringing around 2:30am
no idea who it was
I'm contemplating a run/bike ride
not sure which I want to do
Please see second to last statement about tiredness.
Just saying.
and half a bottle of wine
iow?
oh nm
got it
now what do we do if Lee kidnaps me to go to philly?
I will strangle Lee
he wanted to go last night, but val was on her way to his place
What's his time frame for kidnapping?
so I call val, and she's like, "I have other plans for tonight"
haha
I hope they were successful plans
well he started blowing up my phone around 1:30
not sure if that's a good sign or not
hey, if you end up in Philly and just want to come up afterwards that's fine
If you're not going to be available tonight, just try to let me know before like 7
I def be available to some extent
Lee is a lot of talk, so there's no way to know what's really going down
What are you feelings regarding relatively harmless lies that don't affect anyone?
mmmm
depends
Or: are you going to think poorly of me if I create a fairly simplistic fictional story regarding the keys.
well
seems rather unnecessary
except, and this is what I think is the case, you had family send you the spare set only to find the keys shortly after they had been mailed
Well, I've already been lying by omission by not immediately announcing that I found them.
Yeah, pretty much
And I could technically have gone into the office today
But I had already told my boss about the keys being mailed, and then found them
announcing that you lost them in the first place was probably your downfall
meh
Losing them was the downfall
I probably would have done something similar
Although it led to entertaining things
and I would have also made it so that I got more work/better work done from home
I have, haha
I always get more done at home than I do at work
and I love how you still have Melvin pick you up for your date
You're hilarious
That's such a rom-com cliche, dude.
I really should be writing scripts
I'm cracking up over that for some reason.
at least then I'd have an excuse for being broke and unemployed
He's totally the type to get super pissy about something like that too
XD
It's almost like I know...
but we've discussed this before, me and my 'kind of knowing'
hm?
like when I'm driving and I don't know where I am, I still sorta know
He got lost-ish in the city last night
Which was entertaining
ok, it happens
Yeah
But he'd been asserting earlier that he knows the city really really well
And he went to school at Temple
it's fairly simple
Yes
Although I mostly know walking now
I'm not sure I'd be able to find my way back to 676 without having driven in
We ended up by the museum
It's not lying so much, I've determined. I'm just adjusting the sequence of events for a better story... >.>
oh yeah, ended up by the museum and started out down in Old City / near Eulogy
you weren't far off
walking?
hm?
I know how to get around Center City/Old City/Chinatown now, but mostly while walking. And I'm not sure exactly how to get to 676.
1-way streets and what not don't affect walking
So I'm sure it's a bit more complicated with driving.
I created a mnemonic to remember the streets from Arch to like South, haha
so you were in old city and trying to get on 676 to get to 76?
Yep
ah, 7th is the key, just head north
or I think you can go from columbus blvd somehow
I'll remember that
but that would prolly just put you on 95
7th is the way I knwo
yeah it looks like Columbus would drop you on 95, and you'd just need to exit on 676
yeah, on the left side
but it's kind of a pain, you have to go around on those stupid cobblestone streets
did you go to eulogy?
Oh man
So, he told me to pick a place.
I picked Triumph
haha, so the dumbass who's been calling me finally leaves a message
He said that was cool, then halfway there he was like "do you know where it is?" (again, after bragging about knowing the city)
So he asked if it really mattered, and I said no. So we resolved to just find a place in Center City.
Then he drives to Old City
haha!
And we pass Eulogy, and he's like "oh, how about there"
Sure, whatever.
So we park. I paid for parking because he didn't have any cash.
yeah, triumph is what, a block away
I actually don't know where Triumph is
I thought's where it was
But I've been looking at so many places that I can't keep them straight
Then, as we're walking to Eulogy, we pass an Indian place
And we'd previously discussed liking Indian food, so he was like "how about here"
omfg
Apparently he diverted at that point because I'd said earlier that I was hungry.
Apparently he was unaware that Eulogy serves food.
I'm not joking, it's easily one of the weirdest dates I've _ever_ been on
Oh, and apparently despite his text that said "I'm definitely asking you out" or something along those lines, it _wasn't_ supposed to be a date
The whole thing was just weird weird weird
_Hilarious_ but weird
they have this duck pastry type thingy, i forgets what its called
Ah-mazing!
Where, Eulogy?
the food we ended up having was excellent
We ate at Karma
yeah, I don't usually eat there. I mainly go for the beerlist
yeah
